title: Brain in a Jar
summaries: The Brain in a Jar is a pet item that which has a 25*1/4 (25%) to be dropped by Brain of Cthulhu in Master Mode only. It summons the Spider Brain, which is a miniature version of the Brain of Cthulhu.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a spider brain
'Pickled and shrunken, this brain can no longer hurt you.'
statistics.Sell: 5
